data.title: Royalty Payment
data.meta_description: ascapbmi38 - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. BMI received nearly 13,000 signatures from songwriters and publishers urging the DOJ not to require 100% licensing by PROs like BMI and ASCAP. The letter argues that 100% licensing would severely impact songwriters' livelihoods and creative freedom by limiting their ability to choose which PRO represents their works and who they can collaborate with. It could also delay and lower royalty payments. The songwriters value their relationships with BMI and the benefits it provides. The DOJ is asked to consider these impacts on songwriters and American culture from changing a practice that has worked for decades.
